content: previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the next petal of flower a chain 2 turn that is work into the same flower but a different petal row a4 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 5 turn row a5 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the same petal of flower a chain 2 turn that is you re putting a second slip_stitch into the same hole of flower a row a6 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 5 turn row a7 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the next petal of flower a chain 2 turn repeat row a4 through row a7 three more times at this point the first and last petals of your flower have been slipped into one time and the other four petals have been slipped into twice each 5 2 add the second flower and close the starting edge photos in figures 5 and 6 get a second flower and call it flower b row b1 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the top of a petal of flower b chain 2 turn row b2 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the same petal of flower a chain 2 turn row b3 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the next petal of flower b chain 2 turn row b4 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the next petal of flower a chain 2 turn the petal you slip into is the first petal you worked in flower a row b5 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the same petal of flower b chain 2 turn row b6 with the current vine row b7 double_crochet decrease double_crochet decrease double_crochet chain 2 slip_stitch into the next petal of flower a chain 2 turn 2 double_crochet decrease double_crochet chain 5 turn now the vine is back to being 4 stitches wide row b8 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the same petal of flower b chain 2 turn 4
